briefdescription.para: Update SystemCoreClock according to Clock Register Values.
Setup the microcontroller system. Initialize the PLL and update the SystemCoreClock variable.
CMSIS Cortex-M4 Device Peripheral Access Layer Header File for the Infineon XMC4500 Device Series.
